column5: This morning i ran into some trouble with my Eskimo Shark ice auger. It ran with out any problems for the first 4 holes after that it could not get it to start. Where can i take this auger to be fixed? I'm in mississauga  Thanks in advance
Look up small engine repair on the yellowpages. Any small engine shop should be able to fix it for you.  Here's a start for ya.  Small engine Repair Listings
Big Cliff, a member here, will set you straight. Send him a pm.
Did ya put gas in it...  ..don't laugh..

Check your fuel lines to see if there are any leaks. And check the spark too, have your wife hold the sparkplug wire while you pull the recoil. You will know that you have spark when you end up in diviorce court.

Wayne have lots of gas and hometown I don't seem to have any spark so I guess BIG CLIFF will be getting a pm from me later today. Thanks Doug and everyone that helped out. If cliff is to busy then a small engin shop do Thanks again guys for your help
Check your on/off switch. A wire may be disconected
